Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm working on a mod that needs to render parts of a ship inoperable like fuel tanks and engines and batteries. 

I don't want the parts to exploded they should just be unusable. 

Is there existing functionality on parts to do this or do I have add this?

Welcome to the forums!

Alas, AFAIK pretty much all those things need to be disabled in different ways. There isn't some magic way to just plain disable all a part's functions IIRC.

I figured that much. I tried setting isEnabled on the PartModule to false but this doesn't seem to be working correctly. 

The only way I could get it to work is by removing the PartModule from the part which seems like a very hacky work around. But it is getting the job done.
